name: BUBBLECAB
description:
Introducing BUBBLECAB

Have you ever wanted to be a rescue submarine? Do you like dogs? Well you're in luck! 

Score points by rescuing scuba divers and returning them to the surface. 

Score bonus points by collecting treasure chests.

Use Points at the base station to upgrade your submarine. 

Avoid hitting walls and moving objects

Collect all of the scubadivers in each level to progress
